appDesc.message: Download YouTube videos in all available formats and extract the original audio files

opt_212.message: Always download HD quality audio for video-only files

opt_213.message: Remove downloaded file(s) after successful conversion

opt_216.message: Consider "OPUS" audio-only streams when muxing with WebM video-only stream

opt_511.message: Allow extension to issue desktop notifications

opt_ffmpeg.message: It is recommended to manually install the latest version of FFmpeg from https://www.ffmpeg.org/download.html and insert the executable path here

error_1.message: Your OS is not yet supported

error_3.message: Cannot find the native client. Follow the 3 steps to install the native client

error_7.message: Cannot find any streams in this format. Select another format

error_8.message: Cannot detect video ID. Refresh the tab might help!

error_9.message: Cannot detect the parent player or the parent player is too small

error_10.message: something went wrong/2; Are you sure the native client is installed? If not visit options page to install it.

error_11.message: something went wrong/3; Are you sure the native client is installed? If not visit options page to install it.

error_12.message: something went wrong/1; Are you sure the native client is installed? If not visit options page to install it.

message_2.message: For merging audio- and video-only files FFmpeg is required

message_3.message: Media Converter integration will be available soon!
